LanguageData.ACEN_setting_showMessage_label: Show a message when closing notifications
LanguageData.ACEN_setting_showMessage_desc: A silent message will be displayed when removing old notifications.
LanguageData.ACEN_setting_closeGood_desc: ACEN will automatically close positive (blue) event notifications.
LanguageData.ACEN_setting_closeNonUrgent_desc: ACEN will automatically close negative (yellow) event notifications.
LanguageData.ACEN_setting_closeUrgent_desc: ACEN will automatically close urgent (red) event notifications.
